long_description: Designed for a practical backpacking duo, the MSR Quick(TM) 2 System cookset has a wide range of uses and can be adapted to your needs depending on the length of trip. Cookset includes a 1.5-liter hard-anodized, nonstick pot, a 2.5-liter hard-anodized pot, strainer lid, 2 polypropylene DeepDish plates, 2 insulated mugs and a pot handle. 1.5-liter aluminum pot features a nonstick finish that cleans up easily; hard-anodized pots boasts excellent durability and stick resistance. Brushed aluminum lid features an integrated strainer to eliminate the hassle of draining water from noodles or steamed vegetables. Talon(TM) pot handle attaches to and removes from both pots via exterior brackets, ensuring you don't scratch the inner surfaces. 2 polypropylene DeepDish plates work well no matter what's on the menu, be it soup or pasta. 12.5 fl. oz. insulated mugs keep your drinks hot and easy to handle; set includes sip-through lids. Mugs and plates are color coded to prevent mixups. All MSR Quick 2 System cookset components nest within the 2.5-liter pot for efficient packing.
short_description: Designed for a practical backpacking duo, the MSR Quick(TM) 2 System cookset has a wide range of uses and can be adapted to your needs depending on the length of trip.
